languages.text: {n}Вы замечаете определенные повторяющиеся паттерны в бегущих столбцах рун. Да, вы не понимаете, что они значат, но ясно видите... или скорее чувствуете их схожесть. Указав на них Авелю, вы заставляете его взгляд радостно вспыхнуть.{/n}

{n}You notice certain repeating patterns in the scrolling columns of runes. You may not know what they mean, but you clearly see... or rather sense their similarities. You point these out to Abel, making his face light up with joy.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Вы замечаете определенные повторяющиеся паттерны в бегущих столбцах рун. Да, вы не понимаете, что они значат, но ясно видите... или скорее чувствуете их схожесть. Указав на них Авелю, вы заставляете его взгляд радостно вспыхнуть.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}You notice certain repeating patterns in the scrolling columns of runes. You may not know what they mean, but you clearly see... or rather sense their similarities. You point these out to Abel, making his face light up with joy.{/n}

languages.text: {n}あなたはルーンが流れていくカラムで、特定の繰り返しパターンに気づいた。それが何を意味するのかは理解できないかもしれないが、はっきりと見えた…あるいはそれらの類似性を感じたという方が正しいかもしれない。そのことをアベルに伝えると、その顔が喜びで明るくなった。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You notice certain repeating patterns in the scrolling columns of runes. You may not know what they mean, but you clearly see... or rather sense their similarities. You point these out to Abel, making his face light up with joy.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}あなたはルーンが流れていくカラムで、特定の繰り返しパターンに気づいた。それが何を意味するのかは理解できないかもしれないが、はっきりと見えた…あるいはそれらの類似性を感じたという方が正しいかもしれない。そのことをアベルに伝えると、その顔が喜びで明るくなった。{/n}

languages.text: {n}你注意到，滚动的文字中时常会出现某些重复的文字。你并不清楚这些文字是什么意思，但你却清楚地看到……或者更确切地说，你清楚地感觉到它们之间的相似之处。你将你的发现告诉了亚伯，他露出了开心的神情。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You notice certain repeating patterns in the scrolling columns of runes. You may not know what they mean, but you clearly see... or rather sense their similarities. You point these out to Abel, making his face light up with joy.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你注意到，滚动的文字中时常会出现某些重复的文字。你并不清楚这些文字是什么意思，但你却清楚地看到……或者更确切地说，你清楚地感觉到它们之间的相似之处。你将你的发现告诉了亚伯，他露出了开心的神情。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Du bemerkst, dass sich in den scrollenden Runenkolonnen bestimmte Muster wiederholen. Du weißt zwar nicht, was sie bedeuten, aber du siehst ... oder besser spürst ihre Ähnlichkeiten. Du machst Abel darauf aufmerksam, dessen Miene sich daraufhin deutlich aufhellt.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You notice certain repeating patterns in the scrolling columns of runes. You may not know what they mean, but you clearly see... or rather sense their similarities. You point these out to Abel, making his face light up with joy.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Du bemerkst, dass sich in den scrollenden Runenkolonnen bestimmte Muster wiederholen. Du weißt zwar nicht, was sie bedeuten, aber du siehst ... oder besser spürst ihre Ähnlichkeiten. Du machst Abel darauf aufmerksam, dessen Miene sich daraufhin deutlich aufhellt.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Vous repérez des schémas récurrents dans les colonnes de runes qui défilent à l'écran. Si vous en ignorez la signification, vous voyez clairement... ou plutôt vous sentez leurs similarités. Vous les indiquez à Abel, dont le visage s'illumine de joie.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You notice certain repeating patterns in the scrolling columns of runes. You may not know what they mean, but you clearly see... or rather sense their similarities. You point these out to Abel, making his face light up with joy.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Vous repérez des schémas récurrents dans les colonnes de runes qui défilent à l'écran. Si vous en ignorez la signification, vous voyez clairement... ou plutôt vous sentez leurs similarités. Vous les indiquez à Abel, dont le visage s'illumine de joie.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Adviertes ciertos patrones que se repiten en las columnas descendentes de runas. Puede que ignores su significado, pero ves claramente... o más bien, intuyes sus similitudes. Cuando se lo comentas a Abel, su rostro se ilumina de júbilo.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You notice certain repeating patterns in the scrolling columns of runes. You may not know what they mean, but you clearly see... or rather sense their similarities. You point these out to Abel, making his face light up with joy.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Adviertes ciertos patrones que se repiten en las columnas descendentes de runas. Puede que ignores su significado, pero ves claramente... o más bien, intuyes sus similitudes. Cuando se lo comentas a Abel, su rostro se ilumina de júbilo.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Kayan rün sütunlarında belli bir kalıbın tekrar edip durduğunu fark ediyorsun. Ne anlama geldiklerini bilmiyor olabilirsin ama benzerliklerini açık bir şekilde görebiliyor, daha doğrusu hissedebiliyorsun. Bunları ona gösterdiğinde Abel'in yüzü sevinçle aydınlanıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You notice certain repeating patterns in the scrolling columns of runes. You may not know what they mean, but you clearly see... or rather sense their similarities. You point these out to Abel, making his face light up with joy.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Kayan rün sütunlarında tekrar eden belli bir kalıp fark ediyorsun. Ne anlama geldiklerini bilmiyor olabilirsin ama benzerliklerini açık bir şekilde görebiliyor, daha doğrusu hissedebiliyorsun. Bunları ona gösterdiğinde Abel'in yüzü sevinçle aydınlanıyor.{/n}
